title: Wannabe

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you kill a player, you will join the mafia chat.
- Once you kill a player, you will be given 5 random mafia roles, pick one to become permanently.
- If you pick a Mafia (Espionage) role, you will stay in the mafia chat.
- The host can decide which roles would be too powerful for Wannabe to remember, and can prevent them from being options.

desc:
Post 652
*"When I grow up i want to be the (2081)!"*
